org.fluidity.composition.spi

Interface ComponentFactory.Registry

  • Enclosing interface:
    ComponentFactory

    public static interface ComponentFactory.Registry
    Registry to bind components to by a ComponentFactory. Used by ComponentFactory.Bindings passed to ComponentFactory.Container.instance(Class, ComponentFactory.Bindings) and ComponentFactory.Bindings.bind(ComponentFactory.Registry).

    Usage

    See ComponentFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> void bindComponent(Class<T> implementation, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component class to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
      <T> void bindInstance(T instance, Class<? super T>... interfaces)
      Binds a component instance to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.

    • Method Detail

      • bindComponent

        <T> void bindComponent(Class<T> implementation,
                       Class<? super T>... interfaces)
                throws ComponentContainer.BindingException
        Binds a component class to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the component class to bind.
        Parameters:
        implementation - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindComponent().
        interfaces - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindComponent().
        Throws:
        ComponentContainer.BindingException - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindComponent().

      • bindInstance

        <T> void bindInstance(T instance,
                      Class<? super T>... interfaces)
               throws ComponentContainer.BindingException
        Binds a component instance to an optional list of component interfaces in the container behind this registry.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of component to bind.
        Parameters:
        instance - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindInstance().
        interfaces - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindInstance().
        Throws:
        ComponentContainer.BindingException - see ComponentContainer.Registry.bindInstance().
